document.docAuthor: Hugo Ricardo Secioso Santos, Ulisses Leite Gomes & Patricia Charvet-Almeida
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of whiptail stingray of the genus Dasyatis Rafinesque, 1810 from the Southwestern Atlantic Ocean (Chondrichthyes: Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae).

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of whiptail stingray of the genus Dasyatis Rafinesque, 1810 from the Southwestern Atlantic Ocean (Chondrichthyes: Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae).

subSubSection.paragraph: - MZUSP 9733 (female, 1080 mm TL, 322 mm DW); MZUSP 9709 (male, 770 mm TL, 232 mm DW); MZUSP 9915 (male, 620 mm TL, 281 mm DW); MZUSP 10595.1 (female, 515 mm TL, 267 mm DW); MZUSP 10595.2 (male, 709 mm TL, 369 mm DW); MZUSP 10595.3 (male, 632 mm TL, 345 mm DW); MZUSP 10603.1 (female, 741 mm TL, 376 mm DW); MZUSP 10601.1 (male, 588 mm TL, 320 mm DW); MZUSP 10601.2 (male, 582 mm TL [damaged tail], 361 mm DW); MCN 4606 (male, 476 mm TL, 252 mm DW); MCP 2292 (female, 252 mm TL, 105 mm DW); MCP 2293 (female, 247 mm TL, 101 mm DW); UFRGS 3165 (male, 289 mm TL, 135 mm DW); UFRGS 1584 (male, 254 mm TL, 75 mm DW); UERJ 690 (female, 321 mm TL, 256 mm DW); UERJ 789 (female, 345 mm TL, 162 mm DW); UERJ 1667 (female, 349 mm TL, 165 mm DW); UERJ 1181 (female, 604 mm TL, 281 mm DW); UERJ 1182 (female, 575 mm TL, 185 mm DW); UERJ 1183 (male, 383 mm TL, 172 mm DW); AMNH 15717 (male, 491 mm TL, 221 mm DW).
